message: Nanette Ward will speak about her work with the Central Missouri Coalition in Columbia. She was the local coalition's first speaker when the group began meeting three years ago.

data.description: As the national and local spotlights continue to focus on the problem of human trafficking, a "modern-day abolitionist" will be speaking at the Lake of the Ozarks Stop Human Trafficking
data.title: 'Modern-Day Abolitionist' To Address Lake Of The Ozarks Stop Human Trafficking Coalition This Week
